routes.name: motivational_support
utterances: This is way too hard for me.
routes.description: The user needs motivational support to continue on with their studies

routes.name: update_user_info
utterances: Set my learning preferences to focus on reinforcement learning.
routes.description: The user wants to update/read/delete their personal information

routes.name: recommendations_and_learning_resources
utterances: Can you suggest resources for learning about Computer Vision?
routes.description: the user needs some recomendations of resources for their studying

routes.name: creating_quizzes
utterances: Can you prepare a quiz on neural networks?
routes.description: The user wants to receive a quizz based on provided information

routes.name: send_email
utterances: Compose an email asking for details on the scholarship application process
routes.description: The user wants to send an email to someone

routes.name: generate_citation
utterances: Give me a citation for the deep learning research using MLA format.
routes.description: The user want to have a citation to a givent text from possible documents

routes.name: creating_flashcards
routes.description: The user wants to generate flashcards based on provided information

routes.name: aurora_related
utterances: What is the purpose of summarizing academic papers and other text documents in Aurora?
routes.description: The user wants to know more about Aurora, the Chatbot

routes.name: study_planning
utterances: Generate a weekly study routine for revising key Biology concepts.
routes.description: The user wants to have a study plan based on their preferences

routes.name: summarize_file
utterances: Please summarize the document on machine learning fundamentals I just uploaded.
routes.description: The user wants to recieve the summarised text from the provided file
